column4: Does anyone know how to install a video driver through the command line? Because I've got nothin...
just nvidia, ato, matox or something like that is enough
ok its doesnt matter to pull the trigger :)
first i would try this    sudo mv /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.old && sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start
sudo apt-get update instead of updae of course
